detail_desc: Fitted, rib-knit top with long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
5-pocket baggy jeans in washed, sturdy denim with a button fly, slightly lower crotch and straight legs that taper gently to the hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in washed, lightweight denim. High paper bag waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in patterned cotton with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.

Trenchcoat in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Shoulder tabs and pleats at the shoulder seam, a tie belt at the waist and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft modal and cotton jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Blouse in a viscose weave with one draped shoulder and one with concealed press-studs. Stand-up collar with ties, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with elastication, decorative ties and a flounce at the cuffs.
Necklace with an adjustable, imitation suede strap and a metal ring with four pendants. Maximum length approx. 46 cm.
Fitted top in softly draping, fine-ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with extra-long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed funnel collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a sequined mesh front, small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Partly lined in jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, gently flared top in jersey crêpe with an opening and button at the top and a gathered, frill-trimmed neckline with narrow elastication.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a belt with a buckle. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and side pockets.
Pattern-weave coat with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and front pockets. Adjustable tab with press-studs at the cuffs, and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with a lined front that gives the bust a natural shape and provides light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, no fasteners and an elastic hem.
Cropped top in crocheted cotton with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a scalloped hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Playsuit in textured jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and ties at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a high neckline at the front and low-cut back. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bodysuit is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top’s outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is partly recycled.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a faceted plastic bead.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a plumeti weave with elastication at the top and short raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Seam and a twisted drawstring at the waist and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a ribbed neckline, decorative eyelets at the top, cut-out sections at the shoulders and long sleeves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Jumpsuit in an airy, textured, zebra-striped crêpe weave made from a viscose blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with sewn-on, gently draped panels that create a wrapover, pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and detachable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a deep V-neck at the front and a sewn-in wrapover with ties at one side.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details, a padded, detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, two inner pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Fine-knit gloves with the tops of the thumb, index finger and middle finger in touchscreen-compatible material.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing on the sleeves and hem. Rounded hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and high-cut back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 2 cm.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details with patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Aqua shoes in patterned scuba fabric with a loop at the back and textured soles.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
